titles.title: Savings for Personal Education Continuation Tax Relief Act of 2005
Savings for Personal Education Continuation Tax Relief Act of 2005

To repeal the application of the sunset in the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 to tuition programs which are qualified under section 529 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Savings for Personal Education Continuation Tax Relief Act of 2005 - Declares that the general terminating date of the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 (i.e., December 10, 2010) shall not apply to provisions permitting certain educational institutions to maintain tax-qualified tuition programs.
